lang.name: Olha Vlasova
lang.aboutText: I have been working as a frontend developer for the last threeyears. Have experience with java script, html, css, sass/less, json,pixi.js, pixi-spine, Figma, Photoshop, I am confident with git. I have experience working with self-written game engines. I speak English at the level of communication.
lang.education_step2: National Technical University of Agriculture named afterPetro Vasilenka
lang.mySkils-text: Ready to learn and add to my list of skills.
